title: COMPUTER-IMPLEMENTED SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR NOTIFYING USERS UPON THE OCCURRENCE OF AN EVENT

abstract: A computer-implemented system and method for notifying users on the occurrence of an event is disclosed. An embodiment further includes notifying selected users upon the occurrence of particular events in sessions using a variety of notification methods.
